featured.text: In June 2017, Morgan’s Wonderland celebrated the opening of Morgan’s Inspiration Island.
The creation of the park was inspired by his daughter, Morgan, who suffers from severe cognitive delay and physical challenges.
The success of the park is exactly what Morgan intended to achieve.
The world’s first ultra-accessible family fun park, Morgan’s Wonderland opened in the spring of 2010.

other.text: The advanced technological devices in Morgan’s Wonderland.
Which of the following statements is true about Morgan’s Wonderland? (A)
“The blessing that Morgan has brought is beyond anything that I ever could have imagined and could explain.” 53.
The new addition to Morgan’s Wonderland.

definition.zh_def: 摩根，一種常見的姓氏或名字，通常用於指代某些著名人物或品牌。
definition.en_def: Morgan, a common surname or given name, often referring to notable individuals or brands.
definition.example: Morgan is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
